events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit well and I would like to return it for a full refund.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems with their recent purchase.
The case has been assigned to a customer support representative specialized in refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket and receive a refund. I’m here to help you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags attached?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, never worn outside, and the tags are still intact.
Thanks for the details. I’ve initiated the return process. Please send the jacket back within 14 days using the prepaid shipping label I will email you shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt help. I’ll wait for the shipping label email to proceed with the return.
We have emailed you the prepaid return label. Once we receive the item, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to check if you were able to send the jacket back and if everything went smoothly with the return process.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday via the prepaid label and received confirmation from the courier. Thank you again for your assistance.
The return has been received and your refund completed. We’re closing this case now, but feel free to reach out if you need any further support.
